t: MV Sports acquires The Game brand from Delta - Gift Shop Magazine
s: March 19, 2021 - MV Sport announced Wednesday, March 18, it has completed the purchase of The Game® brand from Delta Apparel. The Game, best known for its iconic trademarked “Bar Design,” is a leading supplier of apparel and headwear in the college and team dealer markets.
